#summary JSON Objects data structure.
=Definitions=
== object object ==
{{{
<!--include file="JSON_lastest.asp"-->
<%
Dim o
Set o = jsObject()

o("name") = "tuğ"
o("name") = o("name") & "rul"

o("surname") = "topuz"
o("lucky_numbers") = Array(1,2,6,7,9)
o("sample_date") = #05.10.2003#
o(Null) = "nasrettin hoca" ' auto variables

o.Flush
%>
}}}
== array object ==
{{{
<!--include file="JSON_lastest.asp"-->
<%
Dim a
Set a = jsArray()

a(Null) = 2
a(Null) = 4
a(Null) = 6
a(Null) = 8

a.Flush
%>
}}}
= Conversions =
== jsArray to jsObject ==
{{{
<!--include file="JSON_lastest.asp"-->
<%
Dim a
Set a = jsArray()

a(Null) = 2
a(Null) = 4
a(Null) = 6
a(Null) = 8

a.Flush

a.Kind = JSON_OBJECT

a.Flush
%>
}}}
== jsObject to jsArray ==
{{{
<!--include file="JSON_lastest.asp"-->
<%
Dim o
Set o = jsObject()

o("name") = "tuğ"
o("name") = o("name") & "rul"

o("surname") = "topuz"
o("lucky_numbers") = Array(1,2,6,7,9)
o("sample_date") = #05.10.2003#
o(Null) = "nasrettin hoca" ' auto variables

o.Flush

o.Kind = JSON_ARRAY

o.Flush
%>
}}}
